knimeNode.name: dbNSFP
knimeNode.shortDescription: dbNSFP: functional predictions from multiple algorithms for the comprehensive collection of human non-synonymous SNPs (NSs)

fullDescription.intro:
Join data with NSFP 1.1 database (http://sites.google.com/site/jpopgen/dbNSFP ).
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: Path to Zipped version of NSFP (NOT 7-zip). Each entry must be sorted on chrom/position.
